achievements.title: Less Than Three
achievements.desc: Mean anime score lower than 3. Is it hate, or is it love?

achievements.title: Watching Anime Is Suffering
achievements.desc: Mean anime score lower than 5. Someone has to counterweight the fanboys, right?

achievements.title: I Love Chinese Cartoons
achievements.desc: Mean anime score higher than 8.5. How about using the whole scale and re-rating stuff? That could make you look less like a fanboy...
